name: Unexplosive Firework
description:
It's New Years and It's time to celebrate, only we're not basing our celebration on the cheers of humans, we're celebrating the soon-arrival of Rocket Jr. who truly believes in reaching the Moon.

This game was originally made for the New Years Minijam, but sadly I was late to it and couldn't finish it in time, today I decided to open it back up and finish it minimally for the sake of New Years, the game is not interesting nor is it beautiful or accurate with its upgrade numeracy.

CONTROLS:

The player plays with the AD keys to move the rocket, M1 (Mouse left-click) to press Buttons and the Spacebar to Pause/Unpause the game.
